Title: Finding Good Talent During a Labor Crisis with Mike Rowe
Description:
Today, we’ll hear from:

•      A business owner who’s having difficulty finding new team members who are qualified for the job

•      Mike Rowe as he shares his thoughts on America’s labor crisis

•      A food truck owner who’s struggling to find dependable and competent team members

•      A business owner who’s wondering where to find thoroughbreds for her cleaning company so she can spend more time with her family and working on her business

•      A business owner who’s trying to decide on the next best hire for his lawn care company
